name: Marshtomp

evolution.description: Marshtomp can evolve into Swampert at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Mud Fish Pokémon. The surface of Marshtomp's body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This Pokémon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by Self Destruct and Explosion moves.
